content:
Participants of theft of construction company and engineer on technical supervision are among the theft. They may be threatened by up to 12 years in prison.

About thisShe reported March 26National Police of Ukraine.

According to the National Budget, the scheme of theft of budget funds during repair works in Dnipropetrovsk region is exposed. Its organizer was the exclusive of the construction company.

For personal enrichment, he involved in the illegal activity of the executive director of the controlled firm and engineer for technical supervision.

In 2019, an agreement was concluded between the Ministry of Defense and the contracting company to perform the overhaul of the dining room in a military town.

During the work, the persons involved in the official documentation of deliberately false information on the volumes of repair.

Asreported the armyinform, the ex-director of one of the state-owned enterprises of the Ministry of Defense was exposed on receiving a $600 thousand bribe.
title: In the Dnieper region, the theft of UAH 3.7 million was exposed to the repair of the dining room for the military
